snippet: Kodak said on Tuesday that it has finished its restructuring and exited Chapter 11.The company said it is now a commercial imaging company serving business markets such as packaging and graphics.
lead_paragraph: Kodak said on Tuesday that it has finished its restructuring and exited Chapter 11.The company said it is now a commercial imaging company serving business markets such as packaging and graphics.

headline.print_headline: Kodak says it has exited bankruptcy
